description: Detects tampering with autologger trace sessions which is a technique used by attackers to disable logging
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Potential AutoLogger Sessions Tampering
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\WMI\\Autologger\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\EventLog\-* OR *\\Defender*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Enable OR *\\Start) AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD (0x00000000)") AND (NOT process.executable.text:"C:\Windows\system32\wevtutil.exe"))
